title: Announcements: Managing an Announcement
body:
Announcements: Managing an Announcement¶

Announcements displays all the announcements that have been created.
The title is displayed, along with a couple of email performance stats and the announcement status (Draft or Sent)

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Announcements

  4. Click an announcement to view the details, audit trail, and comments

  5. (If in draft mode) Click Design Email to design your announcement

    • (If sent) Click View Email to view the announcement

  6. (If in draft mode) Click and Edit Announcement to edit the announcement

  7. (If in draft mode) Click and Design Announcement to design your announcement

  8. (If in draft mode) Click and Send/Schedule Announcement to send your announcement * Select announcement recipients: Click the To field, add a filter criteria, and click Done * You can also opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send immediately: Select a Date, enter a Time, and click Send

  9. Click , Delete Announcement, and Yes to delete the announcement and all associated performance data
